text: On January 21, 2023, a mass shooting happened in Monterey Park, California, United States. Eleven people were killed, and nine others were injured. The shooting happened after a Lunar New Year celebration at Star Ballroom Dance Studio at about 10:22 p.m. PST (UTC-8). The gunman shot and killed himself during a standoff with Torrance police the next day. He was identified as 72-year-old Huu Can Tran (September 30, 1950 â€” January 22, 2023). It is the deadliest mass shooting in the history of Los Angeles County. ==References== Category:2023 crimes in the United States Category:2023 mass shootings Category:2020s crimes in California Category:2020s mass shootings in the United States Category:2020s murders in the United States Category:History of Los Angeles County, California Category:January 2023 events Category:Mass murder in 2023 Category:Mass murder in California Category:Murders by firearm in California
title: Monterey Park shooting
